Description: Solid-cast copper alloy figure of Osiris; square base with a core and a tang, hieroglyphic inscription around base.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2006-2007 6 Oct-18 Feb, Tokyo, National Museum of Nature and Science, Mummy: The Inside Story 2007 17 Mar-17 Jun, Kobe City Museum, Mummy: The Inside Story
Associated names: Named in inscription: Padiamun (followed by kherkek ?)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
